translation: Once the flower's in full bloom, you have to destroy it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Once the flower's in full bloom, you have to destroy it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: There's one more thing I need to tell you.{#Name="Zero"}
source: There's one more thing I need to tell you.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The Intoners have been sealed off in another world.{#Name="Accord"}
source: The Intoners have been sealed off in another world.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: The threat of the flower has been extinguished from this branch.{#Name="Accord"}
source: The threat of the flower has been extinguished from this branch.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: However, the possibility exists that this seal{LF}could unravel at some time or location in the future.{#Name="Accord"}
source: However, the possibility exists that this seal{LF}could unravel at some time or location in the future.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Until then, our recording efforts will continue.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Until then, our recording efforts will continue.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: ...Oh. And a personal addendum regarding my observational target, Zero.{#Name="Accord"}
source: ...Oh. And a personal addendum regarding my observational target, Zero.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Perhaps this is beyond my functional requirements as a Recorder, but{#Name="Accord"}
source: Perhaps this is beyond my functional requirements as a Recorder, but{#Name="Accord"}

translation: I cannot shake the feeling that somehow, somewhere, Zero is still alive.{#Name="Accord"}
source: I cannot shake the feeling that somehow, somewhere, Zero is still alive.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Someday, she and I will see each other again.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Someday, she and I will see each other again.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Crazy, I know. Call it a hunch.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Crazy, I know. Call it a hunch.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Handover of recording duties complete.{#Name="Accord B"}
source: Handover of recording duties complete.{#Name="Accord B"}

translation: Well... I wonder how the future's going to unfold from here on?{#Name="Accord B"}
source: Well... I wonder how the future's going to unfold from here on?{#Name="Accord B"}

translation: Right! Everyone split up and begin recording!{#Name="Accord B"}
source: Right! Everyone split up and begin recording!{#Name="Accord B"}

translation: I hope to see you again someday.{#Name="Accord B"}
source: I hope to see you again someday.{#Name="Accord B"}

translation: I'd like to say...{LF}Thank you for playing!{#Name="Accord B"}
source: I'd like to say...{LF}Thank you for playing!{#Name="Accord B"}

translation: I...I had a lot of fun.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I...I had a lot of fun.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: With you, I mean. It was fun being with you.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: With you, I mean. It was fun being with you.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: The killing was hard. It was really hard, but...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: The killing was hard. It was really hard, but...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: But getting to be with you, Zero.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: But getting to be with you, Zero.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Getting to eat next to you...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Getting to eat next to you...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Getting to fly around with you...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Getting to fly around with you...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Getting to have you yell at me...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Getting to have you yell at me...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: And then getting to be friends again...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: And then getting to be friends again...{#Name="Mikhail"}
